excerpt: "At AWS, our goal is to make it easier for organizations to connect to all of their data, and to do it with the speed and agility our customers need. We've developed our pioneering approach to a zero-ETL future based on these goals: Break down data silos, make data integration easier, and increase the pace of your data-driven innovation."
